attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the fcPort instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the FC port, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Current operational status information for the FC port.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier of the FC port's enclosure, as defined by the resourceRef resource type.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Physical location of the FC port.

attributes.name: wwn
attributes.description: World Wide Name (WWN) of the FC port.

attributes.name: availableSpeeds
attributes.description: Available data transmission speed values for the FC port.

attributes.name: currentSpeed
attributes.description: Current data transmission speed of the FC port.

attributes.name: requestedSpeed
attributes.description: Data transmission speed requested by the user.

attributes.name: sfpSupportedSpeeds
attributes.description: SFP (the small form-factor pluggable) supported speeds of the FC port.

attributes.name: sfpSupportedProtocols
attributes.description: SFP (the small form-factor pluggable) supported protocols of the FC port.

attributes.name: connectorType
attributes.description: Physical connector type.

attributes.name: storageProcessor
attributes.description: SP on which the FC port directly or indirectly resides, as defined by the storageProcessor resource type.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the FC port needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - FC port needs replacement.
  • false - FC port does not need replacement.

attributes.name: nPortId
attributes.description: Port on the node host or storage device used with FC point-to-point or FC switched fabric topologies.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: FC port name.

attributes.name: shortName
attributes.description: FC port short name.

attributes.name: cascadeNames
attributes.description: Hierarchical port name, which consists of the following components: I/O module name (if an I/O module is present) Port name Associated SP

attributes.name: parentIOModule
attributes.description: (Applies if the FC port resides on an I/O module.) Parent I/O module of the FC port, as defined by the ioModule resource type.

attributes.name: parentStorageProcessor
attributes.description: (Applies if the FC port resides directly on an SP.) Parent SP of the FC port, as defined by the storageProcessor resource type.

attributes.name: portRepCapabilities
attributes.description: FC port replication capability.

content.name: fcPort
content.description: Fibre Channel (FC) front end port settings. Applies if the FC protocol is supported on the system and the corresponding license is installed.
